circumstances: The pilot, sole on board, was completing a crop-spraying flight in Leninsky, district of Timashevsk. En route, the engine lost power then failed. The pilot reduced his altitude in an attempt to make an emergency landing when the right wing struck trees, causing the aircraft to crash. The pilot was injured and the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause: Engine failure after particles of rubber sealing rings went into the cylinder head, causing the failure of cylinder n°4 and 6.
